Text:
Thanks for this, really appreciate the music.

One thing, why are people (like you) including those gay little "padding file" BS in torrents nowadays that are nothing more than ads for bitcomet?

Why you gotta be all batty?
Please do not stop seeding. Many thanks.

Be sure not to miss the FLAC soundtrack from Monkey Island 2: Lechuck's Revenge which is available here: http://thepiratebay.org/tor/4173086/Monkey_Island_2_soundtrack_%5Bhigh_quality_FLAC%5D

I'm the only one seeding it right now and would appreciate some help.
